laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased to 31 mm/hr after approximately one month of therapy.
Decreased to 0.5 mg/dL after approximately one month of therapy.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Healing of the lesion in the right ilium with a marked cortical response.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Demonstrated a decrease in the size of the lesions and the development of sclerotic-appearing bone within them after one year.
